content.raw:
* There are outdated links in the [style](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code&cat=development#Style) section pointing to `default` when they should be pinned to a commit to make sure the line doesn't change
* Some info is outdated, like the dashboard
* While most of the tutorial applies to Gazebo and the Ignition libraries, some parts of it don't, like a big chunk of the "Internal Developers" section. It may be worth it pointing that out, because we do use this document as a reference for Ignition a lot of times.
content.html:
• There are outdated links in the style section pointing to default when they should be pinned to a commit to make sure the line doesn't change
  • Some info is outdated, like the dashboard
  • While most of the tutorial applies to Gazebo and the Ignition libraries, some parts of it don't, like a big chunk of the "Internal Developers" section. It may be worth it pointing that out, because we do use this document as a reference for Ignition a lot of times.
